step_feedback.feedback: Good job maintaining a relatively still posture during inhalation.  Remember to visualize the fluid moving towards your chest as you inhale.
You placed your hands on your abdomen as instructed.  Focus on relaxing your muscles completely during exhalation to facilitate optimal fluid movement.
While the inhalation technique shows improvement, ensure whole-body muscle tightening is consistent throughout the inhalation phase.  Visualizing fluid movement will help.
The exhalation needs more focus on relaxing your muscles completely.  Visualize pushing the fluid out as you exhale slowly through your mouth.

exercise_summary: The patient demonstrated good posture and hand placement.  Inhalations showed good form, but the muscle tightening could be more consistent. Exhalations need more focus on complete muscle relaxation to optimize lymphatic drainage.  Visualizing fluid movement during both phases should be emphasized.
